item.title: Indian shares rise on upbeat sentiment; IT leads gains on US rate cut hopes

review.headline_rewrite: Indian shares rise on upbeat sentiment; IT leads gains on US rate cut hopes
bullets: The Nifty 50 rose 0.42% to 24,527.55 points and the BSE Sensex added 0.39% to 80,124.78 as of 10:23 a.m.
Investors took heart from a better-than-expected gross domestic product (GDP) growth of 7.8% in the April-June quarter.
The Federal Reserve tracks the PCE price measures for its 2% inflation target.
Among individual stocks, Torrent Power rose 2.1% after securing an order worth 220 billion rupees ($2.51 billion).
